summary: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.
cast: Gabriel Byrne|Julianna Margulies|Ron Eldard|Desmond Harrington|Isaiah Washington|Alex Dimitriades|Karl Urban|Emily Browning|Francesca Rettondini|Boris Brkic|Bob Ruggiero|Iain Gardiner|Adam Bieshaar|Cameron Watt|Jamie Giddens|Matthew Wollaston
keywords: ghost ship|characters murdered one by one|evil spirit|death trap|reference to the bering straits
title: Ghost Ship (Barco Fantasma)
